NAME: Attribute based access control
DESCRIPTION: Grant or deny access to resources based on attributes of the user with in the ngac graph

NAME: Attribute based cryptography
DESCRIPTION: Encrypt or decrypt data based on attributes of the user with in the ngac graph

NAME: Accessing and decrypting data
DESCRIPTION: Grant or deny access and if granted decrypt data based on attributes of the user with in the ngac graph

NAME: Attribute based storage and encryption
DESCRIPTION: Encrypt and store data based on attributes of the user and some policy.

NAME: Dynamic attributes
DESCRIPTION: Support dynamic attributes such as time and location.

NAME: Custom database
DESCRIPTION: More permanent storage of attributes and policies.

NAME: Functional interface using terminal
DESCRIPTION: Use the terminal to access the system.

NAME: Visualization of attributes
DESCRIPTION: Visualize attributes of the user as graph and tree.

NAME: Fully featured TUI
DESCRIPTION: Use the terminal to access the system.
